findings.title: Authorized account can change the maximum transaction amount.
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify the maximum allowed transaction amount.

findings.title: Authorized account can include in and exclude from dividends.
findings.description: The authorized account has the capability to include or exclude certain entities from receiving dividends, which could lead to unfair distribution of funds.

findings.title: Authorized account can include in and exclude from fee and transaction amount
findings.description: The authorized account has the capability to modify fee and transaction amounts, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized account can change fees.
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify fee settings, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized account can change fee receivers.
findings.description: The authorized account has the capability to modify the recipients of fees, which may lead to unintended consequences and potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized account can change swap threshold and disable/enable swap
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify the swap threshold and enable or disable the swap functionality.

findings.title: Authorized account can change target liquidity values.
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to modify target liquidity values, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized account can change distribution criteria.
findings.description: The authorized account has the privilege to alter the distribution criteria, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized account can change distribution GAS
findings.description: The authorized account has the capability to alter the distribution of GAS.

findings.title: Unrestricted Withdrawal of BNBs to IDEXPair Address
findings.description: The contract allows anybody to withdraw BNBs to the IDEXPair address without any restrictions or authorization checks.

findings.title: Owner can change cooldown status.
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the cooldown status, which may lead to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change max wallet amount restriction.
findings.description: Authorized account has the privilege to modify the maximum wallet amount restriction.
